content: http://www.healthintersections.com.au/?p=2746 - this is intended to clarify how you can do this sort of thing without needing vendor involvement once the argonaut solution is in place
I'm not exactly sure where in the formal documentation this belongs....
If anyone is interested in using Smart on FHIR for this (@Ian McNicoll) in practice, we can talk about this at the smart on fhir tables at 13:30 (after lunch)
